name: Introducing the inflight Video VIP Lounge!
description:
VIP Lounge: http://members.inflightvideo.tv

Introducing the inflight Video VIP Lounge!  I wanted to give a little extra with my full flight videos so I'm hoping you enjoy this new website that I'm launching.  It offers early access to all of my full flight videos, animated flight maps (Airshow Map function), live flight tracking links and more.  Subscribe today and get a free 2 day trial to these extra features!
